original_body_lines: The arrests were made during the past 24 hours that ended at 12.30 on Friday (22) morning.
Sri Lanka Police said 145 of the arrested suspects are being further investigated under detention orders.
Investigations have also commenced regarding the illegal assets of 40 suspects.
Sri Lanka Police said 134 drug addicts have been referred to rehabilitation centers.
Sri Lanka Police added that 613g of heroin, 746g of ICE, 16kg and 500g of marijuana were also seized, during yesterday's operations.
263g of hashish, 49kg and 400g of mawa, and 16g of the drug 'Ash' were also seized during operations.
